name: Paula Anne Carrigg & Sharyn Anne
quote: ...An absolute tranquil escape and the intimacy of the staff is off the charts. It's such a privilege and honor to stay in this space for 8 days, we haven't gone out, we've stayed, 8 days and we have not left the place....
caption: Stayed In The Avatar Tree House In April 2024

name: Harris Celeste Wright & Ethan Garth Foster
quote: ...It's the authenticity, it's the uniqueness, it's the healing feature and it's the consistency of superior service...People come here and become part of a family that has already been created...
caption: Stayed In The Avatar Tree House In March 2024
